Title: Description
Percentage exposed soil: Annual mean precentage of soil that is unprotected by living vegetation or litter as mapped from MODIS satellite imagery following the methodology of Guerschman and colleagues (CSIRO).

Title: RegionLabels
Percentage exposed soil: See file STATE_CODE.csv to match RegionCode to region name.

Title: ColumnLabels
Percentage exposed soil: See file DLCD_codes.csv to match ColumnID to category name.
